page.title: 06Modern Chelmsford School (1)
page.content:
{Newlands Spring}School was opened in {1981}as a new{open plan school.}The ages of the people on the estate range from very young to very old. Many of the elderly people visited our school and gave their impressions and talked of their own school days and how things have changed.
Our school is very bright and colourful. Each bay is beautifully decorated and has plenty of display areas for childrens' work. The windows are large letting in a lot of light. The bays have carpets covering the floor apart from the art areas which are lino-covered. Our interviews showed us that school was not always like this. One elderly gentleman told us that his school was cold and dark and that the toilets were across the playground and often froze in winter.
